title: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad (2015) #3 (Crosby Connecting Variant C)
description: GET READY FOR JAW-DROPPING REVEALS, FLASH FLOODS AND MASKED BANDITS AS MARVEL'S ALL-NEW EPIC BASED ON DISNEY'S THRILL-PACKED ATTRACTION ROARS ONWARDS! - Abigail Bullion knew there was something strange about her father's mine in Big Thunder Mountain...but she never expected this! - Desperate times call for desperate alliances...and a flash flood in the desert town is as desperate as it gets! - Plus: the shocking truth about the gang of bandits that will change Abby's destiny!

textObjects.text: GET READY FOR JAW-DROPPING REVEALS, FLASH FLOODS AND MASKED BANDITS AS MARVEL'S ALL-NEW EPIC BASED ON DISNEY'S THRILL-PACKED ATTRACTION ROARS ONWARDS! - Abigail Bullion knew there was something strange about her father's mine in Big Thunder Mountain...but she never expected this! - Desperate times call for desperate alliances...and a flash flood in the desert town is as desperate as it gets! - Plus: the shocking truth about the gang of bandits that will change Abby's destiny!
